title: OPA182IDBVR__TI_0_alldatasheet
description: Operational amplifiers with various features including rail-to-rail output and zero-drift.

## 5 Device Comparison Table

---

| PRODUCT   | FEATURES                                                                                                                     |
|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| OPA2189   | 0.4-µV offset, 0.005-µV/°C drift, 5.2-nV/√Hz, rail-to-rail output, 36-V, zero-drift, MUX-friendly CMOS                       |
| OPA2188   | 6-µV offset, 0.03-µV/°C drift, 8.8-nV/√Hz, rail-to-rail output, 36-V, zero-drift, MUX-friendly CMOS                          |
| OPA2187   | 1-µV offset, 0.001-µV/°C drift, 100-µA quiescent current, rail-to-rail output, 36-V, zero-drift CMOS                         |
| OPA2388   | 0.25-µV offset, 0.005-µV/°C drift, 7-nV/√Hz, 10-MHz, true rail-to-rail input/output, 5.5-V, zero-drift, zero- crossover CMOS |
| OPA2180   | 120-µV, 10-MHz, 5.1-nV/√Hz, 36-V JFET input industrial op amp                                                                |

## Table 6-1. Pin Functions: OPA182

---

| PIN   | PIN      | PIN          |        |                                               |
|-------|----------|--------------|--------|-----------------------------------------------|
| NAME  | D (SOIC) | DBV (SOT-23) | TYPE   | DESCRIPTION                                   |
| -IN   | 2        | 4            | Input  | Inverting input                               |
| +IN   | 3        | 3            | Input  | Noninverting input                            |
| NC    | 1, 5, 8  | -            | -      | No internal connection; can be left floating. |
| OUT   | 6        | 1            | Output | Output channel                                |
| V-    | 4        | 2            | Power  | Negative supply                               |
| V+    | 7        | 5            | Power  | Positive supply                               |
